Package stages

Class Summary
MilitaryTheatresStage This class has one static method.
MilitaryTheatresStage.BattleThread An Instance of this class runs a battle.
ProductionStage This class holds one static method.
StrategicIntelligenceStage Holds the methods responsible for implementing the strategic intelligence stage.
StrategicMovementsStage This class has a static method, which is responsible for moving military units to states that need them the most.
